Headline: #4 Cottage Grove and #X4 Cottage Grove Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/51st
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove and X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily rerouted, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/51st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove and #X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, Payne Drive, Drexel, 47th, Cottage Grove and over normal route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/51st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Pulaski (Congress)
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski (Congress) due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski (Congress) due to a door problem on a train.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#53 Pulaski

#54 Cicero

#50 Damen

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
